reuters.title: CCL UNIT ACQUIRES NESTLE CANADA CAN OPERATIONS
reuters.body: <CCL Industries Inc>'s Continental Can Canada Inc unit said it acquired the Wallaceburg, Ontario, metal can making operations of Nestle Enterprises Ltd, wholly owned by <Nestle SA>, of Switzerland. Terms were undisclosed. Continental Can said it would supply Nestle's equivalent can requirements under a long-term agreement. Nestle said it decided to stop manufacturing cans "in order to be in a better position to take full advantage of the changes underway or on the horizon in food packaging technology." Reuter 
